name: The Rising
summary: Wadazine Master Collection 01: The Rising or shortly WMC01: The Rising is a six-level collaborative mapset for Doom II and the GZDoom source port, created by various members of The Doom Master Wadazine community led by Alexa Jones-Gonzales (Remilia Scarlet), with support from Christian Blair (Endless). It is the first entry in the Wadazine Master Collection series. The project started on March 11, 2021. The first version was released on April 25, 2021. The maps were created with heavy use of Doom 3 textures.
